title: In Need Of New Champ (Preferably ADC)
body:
Hi, I am thinking of getting a new champ and that so happens to either be Lucian or Caitlyn, I've played them both whilst in Free Rotation and I need some help deciding which one, this decision can be made by either difficulty or in terms of fun.

Thanks for your help (/^w^)/

EDIT: If you want to know what I play, its Vayne Draven Kalista and Twitch ATM

replies.body: Seems like you like kiting, so I'd say Lucian. Do you like kiting?
likes kiting...recommends the melee range over the long range kite champ....ok

Lucian has an inbuilt kiting dash that has somewhat of a reset on it.

Caitlyn has nothing to kite with really.
Her E slows tho... and pushes her back
Lucian can kite several people, Caitlyn can kite one, and Caitlyn is really only good for "I win laning phase but if i'm not good and snowball we lose because i'm a useless ADC"

lucy has near melee range...cait has godlike range.

cait is much easier to kite with.

cait actually has a ton of late game damage, with the fact she has some of the highest crits in the game. its just she doesnt have any amplifying damage apart from her passive. whereas lucian has....oh wait, lucian has LESS. its just he has burst with his combo done correctly. but wait...his combo is about 500-800 range effectively...so if he goes in to use it....2 shot by anyone with actual burst.

cait is by far the better champion. if lucian wasnt blatantly Over Powered with everything everywhere. still much better to learn cait than lucian.
Ok, I am turning towards Lucian. Thanks guys {{champion:236}}
Lucian is definitely the one to pick of the two, Caitlyn is basically a useless champion.

Your current champs show that you tend to play high damage champs with reasonable to hard mechanics but definitely a reliance on mechanic based champs 
I reckon you should go for Lucian he fits more with your playstyle

They are two different play styles, so it depend which is more suited to you. 
If you have mechanics and tend to play aggressively, Lucian would be the better option for easier kiting. 
If you prefer a more passive playstyle, like poking, or struggling with positioning go Caitlyn.
